mapper.insert: INSERT INTO meeting ( category_id, meeting_name, meeting_description, meeting_date, meeting_place, current_people, meeting_people, meeting_image, created_by, created_date, updated_date) VALUES ( #{categoryId}, #{meetingName}, #{meetingDescription}, #{meetingDate}, #{meetingPlace}, 0, #{meetingPeople}, #{meetingImage}, #{createdBy}, now(), now())
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM meeting ORDER BY created_date ASC LIMIT #{size} OFFSET #{startSize}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM meeting WHERE category_id = #{categoryId}
SELECT * FROM meeting WHERE category_id = #{categoryId} ORDER BY created_date ASC LIMIT #{pagination.size} OFFSET #{pagination.startSize}
